The Scions of Lok still believe they can resurrect their lord. They are so loyal, they'll even sacrifice their own lives for the cause.

That may open up a particularly grisly branch of research to us.

Search for scion corpses and recover them. If we study them, we might further our knowledge of Lok himself. Naturally, we'll share all data with the federation.

Let's take a look at what you've found. The good news is they're definitely dead.

Interesting. The bones haven't turned black, which is a precursor to the body becoming a wraith.

Instead they have a strange green tint. Is this a natural phenomenon? Something magical? If we could replicate this, we might be able to prevent others from becoming wraiths!
It's a dirty job, but someone has to do it. Come on, it's not that bad. You're just retrieving some corpses.
